refbody.section: Indicates the location of tracing files.

section.title: Security Considerations
section.p: See for information about customizing the Network Server's security policy.

section.title: Default
section.p: If the derby.system.home property has been set, it is the default. Otherwise, the default is the current directory.

section.title: Static or dynamic
section.p: Dynamic. You can change system values by using commands after the Network Server has been started.
